name: .DMSM File Extension
summary: Learn about .DMSM files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Movie project created with VideoWave, a video editing program bundled with Roxio Creator; contains movie project data and settings, including effects, transitions, references to video and audio files, and other video editing information.

content: DMSM files are used to save and load project information for video editing. They can be exported to a variety of video file formats or burned to DVDs and Blu-ray discs for sharing with others.

NOTE: DMSM files are not suitable for sharing with other users since they contain references to video and audio files, but not the files themselves. If you want to share a DMSM project for someone else to edit, you must also share all referenced multimedia files, which must be organized using the same directory structure.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
